hero.head: Sajeel Ahmad
hero.copy: A software engineer specializing in full-stack web development with primary focus on the back-end technologies.

about.intro: Who the hell is this guy?
about.head: About me.
copy: We might’ve gotten off on the wrong foot, so allow me to properly introduce myself. Hi, my name is Sajeel Ahmad, I'm 24 years old and I enjoy building things for the web!

Fueled by undoubtedly weird sense of humor and lots of coffee (mostly the latter), I spend most of my waking hours looking for interesting project ideas and ways to leave my mark on the ethereal thing that is the Internet.
Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with lately:

jobs.title: Software Engineer (Full-Stack)
items: Developed various efficient booking systems, ensuring seamless functionality and user-friendly interfaces

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
items: Custom theme, templates and post types development for a highly trafficked website
Converting Figma designs to fully responsive, functional and interactive website pages
SEO and performance optimization using various caching and lazy-loading techniques
Custom solutions development using React along with TypeScript and 3rd party APIs
Production of clean, easily-maintainable and scaleable React.js code

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
items: Converting Figma designs to fully responsive, functional and interactive website pages
SEO and performance optimization using various caching and lazy-loading techniques
Integrated Stripe payment gateway for subscription-based services
Production of clean, easily-maintainable and scaleable React.js code

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
items: Converting Figma designs to fully responsive, functional and interactive website pages
Managed AWS EC2 instances and S3 buckets
Fixed bugs in mobile app using React Native

contact.head: Get in touch.
copy: Whether you have a question, looking to hire or you have a project idea for the next billion dollar unicorn that will take us to the moon. Stop by and say hi and I’ll do my best not to ghost you or leave you hanging for too long!
